TEXT.TITLE: FNMA DELAYS DEBENTURE OFFERING ANNOUNCEMENT
TEXT.BODY: The Federal National Mortgage Association said it will announce its coming debenture offering next Monday instead of this Friday as originally scheduled. It said the debentures, which are for settlement April 10, will be priced next Tuesday and the offering will take place April 1. Reuter
